languages.text: Обгорелые трупы слиплись в единый ком плоти, пытаясь заслонить собой несколько тел поменьше.
The charred corpses are huddled together in a single lump of charred flesh, with many clearly trying to shield the smaller bodies among them.
languages.original_text: Обгорелые трупы слиплись в единый ком плоти, пытаясь заслонить собой несколько тел поменьше.

traits.locale_text: The charred corpses are huddled together in a single lump of burnt flesh, trying to shield several bodies of smaller size.
The charred corpses are huddled together in a single lump of burnt flesh, trying to shield several bodies of smaller size.
The charred corpses are huddled together in a single lump of charred flesh, with many clearly trying to shield the smaller bodies among them.

languages.text: Los cadáveres calcinados están agrupados en un solo montón de carne incinerada, y muchos de ellos intentaban a todas luces proteger a los más pequeños.
languages.original_text: The charred corpses are huddled together in a single lump of charred flesh, with many clearly trying to shield the smaller bodies among them.

traits.locale_text: Los cadáveres calcinados están agrupados en un solo montón de carne incinerada, y muchos de ellos intentaban a todas luces proteger a los más pequeños.

languages.text: 黒焦げの死体は身を寄せ合って、ひとつの炭の肉の塊になっている。その多くが、その中の小さな体を守ろうとしているようだった。
languages.original_text: The charred corpses are huddled together in a single lump of charred flesh, with many clearly trying to shield the smaller bodies among them.

traits.locale_text: 黒焦げの死体は身を寄せ合って、ひとつの炭の肉の塊になっている。その多くが、その中の小さな体を守ろうとしているようだった。

languages.text: 无数烧焦的尸体挤在一起，变成了一团烧焦的血肉。很明显，许多人临死前在努力保护怀里的孩子。
languages.original_text: The charred corpses are huddled together in a single lump of charred flesh, with many clearly trying to shield the smaller bodies among them.

traits.locale_text: 无数烧焦的尸体挤在一起，变成了一团烧焦的血肉。很明显，许多人临死前在努力保护怀里的孩子。

languages.text: Die verkohlten Leichen sind zu einem einzigen Klumpen verbrannten Fleisches verschmolzen. Die Opfer hatten sich zusammengekauert, die kleinsten Leichen befinden sich im Inneren des Kreises. Man wollte sie beschützen.
languages.original_text: The charred corpses are huddled together in a single lump of charred flesh, with many clearly trying to shield the smaller bodies among them.

traits.locale_text: Die verkohlten Leichen sind zu einem einzigen Klumpen verbrannten Fleisches verschmolzen. Die Opfer hatten sich zusammengekauert, die kleinsten Leichen befinden sich im Inneren des Kreises. Man wollte sie beschützen.

languages.text: Les cadavres calcinés sont regroupés en une seule masse de chair carbonisée. Beaucoup ont visiblement tenté de protéger des corps plus petits, en vain.
languages.original_text: The charred corpses are huddled together in a single lump of charred flesh, with many clearly trying to shield the smaller bodies among them.

traits.locale_text: Les cadavres calcinés sont regroupés en une seule masse de chair carbonisée. Beaucoup ont visiblement tenté de protéger des corps plus petits, en vain.

languages.text: Yanıklı cesetler, et yığını misali bir araya toplanmış. Birçoğu da açık şekilde aralarındaki ufak bedenleri korumaya çalışmış.
languages.original_text: The charred corpses are huddled together in a single lump of charred flesh, with many clearly trying to shield the smaller bodies among them.
